Featured Project

Youtube Clone App with React

It's a youtube clone app with search functionallity, navigation, recommended videos, that i developed with Youtube Data API to get the necessary data. The search functioanllity its very interesting the result of that it will contains information about youtube video, like channelImage, video title, subscribers and so on.

Featured Project

Music Player with React

This web application is a simple music player created with React that has a Library with 8 songs with next functionalities like play, pause, next, previous and all 8 songs are chill music genre. This project is a kind minimalist because the app is not overload with many components chaotic rendered on the screen that has no sense and it's a Single Page app.
